text: Allahe'i se'i satta yijane bataha praerana karae, phalata i meghamalaka sancalita karae, tara pichata te'om iyaka yene iccha akasata prasaraita karai diye, arau iyaka khanda-bikhanda karai diye, phalata tumi dekhibalai poraa tara majara paraa ola'i ahe barasunara topala, tara pichata yetiya te'om iyaka te'omra bandasakalara majata yisakalara ocarata iccha paumca'i diye tetiya sihamta anandita haya
